    • Uses of CompressionMode in org.apache.lucene.codecs.compressing

      Fields in org.apache.lucene.codecs.compressing declared as CompressionMode 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static CompressionMode CompressionMode.FAST
      A compression mode that trades compression ratio for speed.
      static CompressionMode CompressionMode.FAST_DECOMPRESSION
      This compression mode is similar to FAST but it spends more time compressing in order to improve the compression ratio.
      static CompressionMode CompressionMode.HIGH_COMPRESSION
      A compression mode that trades speed for compression ratio.

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DeflateWithPresetDictCompressionMode
      A compression mode that trades speed for compression ratio.
      class  LZ4WithPresetDictCompressionMode
      A compression mode that compromises on the compression ratio to provide fast compression and decompression.
